page.title: 04Village Post Office Cressage
page.content: The{Post Office}is situated on the A458 next to the bakery on the {Shrewsbury}side of the village. Mr.Doveston is the Post Master.{Mail is collected twice daily and sorted in Shrewsbury.Mail for Cressage is brought to the P.O. early in the morning, and the post lady sorts and delivers it. T.V, Dog and Game {licenses}can be purchased. Old Age {Pensions}and Child{Benefits}are available. Telephone and Rate{bills may be paid also.The{stamps}sold range from 1p_Â£5.OO in value.The stock system is computerized. The{shop,}which forms the other half of the business, sells{groceries, {sweets}and{cigarettes.}Mr.Doveston also organises the delivery of morning and evening{newspapers.}The shop opens at 6am and closes at 5.30pm.
